name: ShootEmGB
description:
A shooter of horizontal scroll made with Godot as a submisison for the "GBJAM 8" game jam.

X = A (Basic Attack, Accept)

C = B (Bomb Attack, Back)

ENTER = START (Accept)

UP, DOWN = MOVE UP OR DOWN

ESC (HOLD) = POWER OFF (may not work in browser.)

Note: Downloadable versions are better.
